newsitem.title: USA: Technology Solutions sees global growth.
newsitem.headline: Technology Solutions sees global growth.

text.p: Technology Solutions Co said it is poised for further international revenue growth.
It said international revenues for the August 31 first quarter represented 15 percent of the company's total revenues for the period compared to no such revenues recorded in the year-earlier quarter.
The company said it continues to invest globally and expects to open additional international offices this year.
On Tuesday, Technology Solutions posted first-quarter earnings of $0.03 per share, up from $0.08. Revenues advanced to $32.2 million from $20.7 million a year ago.
Separately, Technology Solutions said it has launched a new business sector to support the telecommunications industry.
It said James Carluccio, executive vice president, will direct the effort.
The company is managing large-scale projects at regional Bell operating companies, a Latin American-based long distance provider and European telecommunications clients.
"We will apply our management consulting and systems integration services, and call center and electronic commerce expertise," Carluccio said in a statement.
